ai-kv17.8:0.4_0: Discussion of the ninth from the Ganges:
ai-kv17.8:1.2_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:1.4_0: Doesn’t they make meals for the Sangha?
ai-kv17.8:1.6_0: Sometimes he do the duties for the Sangha. He then surely will be suspended,
ai-kv17.8:1.7_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:2.2_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:2.5_0: “For a meal before another, which is designated, not unfinished; he eats food at the wrong time.”
ai-kv17.8:2.8_0: “Take a meal before another, he doesn’t get enough food and drink that he doesn’t want to eat a meal before another.”
ai-kv17.8:2.9_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:3.2_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:3.4_0: The Buddha has spoken of eight kinds of drinks:
ai-kv17.8:3.5_0: mango drinks, rose-apple drinks, drinks from bananas with seeds, drinks from seedless banas, licorice drinks, grape drinks, drinks made from lotus tubers, falsa fruit drinks.
ai-kv17.8:3.7_0: And the Buddha has spoken of eight kinds of demonstration:
ai-kv17.8:3.8_0: mango drinks, rose-apple drinks, drinks from seeds, drinks from seedless banas, rose-apple drinks,
ai-kv17.8:3.9_0: if he eats it, he drinks it, and eats it;
ai-kv17.8:4.1_0: The Sangha eats it, eats it,
ai-kv17.8:4.3_0: if he eats it, he eats it, eats it, eats it, and drinks it;
ai-kv17.8:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.8:4.5_0: The Sangha should not accept the invitation procedure.
